2670.T.summary: ABC-Mart,Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retailing of shoes, clothing, and general merchandise products for men, women, and kids in Japan. It develops and manufactures shoes; and licenses various brands. The company is also involved in the sale of owned and purchased products through ABC-MART stores. It offers its products under the VANS, HAWKINS, Saucony, NUOVO, gravis, DANNER, SPERRY, and WHITE'S HOUSE brand names. It operates approximately of 37 stores in Hokkaido, 51 stores in Tohoku, 143 stores in Tokyo, 276 stores in Kanto, 156 stores in Chubu, 164 stores in Kansai, 70 stores in Chugoku and Shikoku, and 130 stores in Kyushu and Okinawa in Japan, as well as 268 stores in South Korea, 51 stores in Taiwan, and 6 stores in the United States. ABC-Mart,Inc. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2686.T.summary: Gfoot Co.,Ltd. sells footwear in Japan. It offers men's shoes, ladies' shoes, sports shoes, and imported goods. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2778.T.summary: Palemo Holdings Co.,Ltd. owns and operates a chain of specialty stores for women's apparel, variety goods, and bags in Japan. The company is also involved in the delivery agency business. As of February 20, 2020, it operated 487 stores. The company was formerly known as Palemo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Palemo Holdings Co.,Ltd. in August 2017. The company was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

3070.T.summary: Amagasa Co., Ltd. plans, develops, wholesales, and retails non-leather women's footwear in Japan. The company offers its products primarily under the JELLY BEANS brand. It also imports and exports women's shoes. Amagasa Co., Ltd. sells its products to specialty shoe stores, department stores, and apparel customers. It also operates online shops. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3189.T.summary: ANAP Inc. engages in the apparel retailing business in Japan. It operates in three segments: Internet Retailing Business, Store Retailing Business, and Wholesale Distribution Business. The Internet Retailing Business segment sells its products directly to general customers through the internet. The Store Retailing Business segment sells to general customers face-to-face. The Wholesale Distribution Business segment sells to select shops. The company offers its products under the ANAP, ANAP GiRL, ANAP Kids, anap mimpi, CHILLE, Latina, Settimissimo, Alluge, Anap USA, ANAP HOME, Factor, and AULI brands. As of August 31, 2020, it operated 29 stores. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3548.T.summary: Baroque Japan Limited engages in the retail and wholesale of apparel and accessories for women, men, and kids. Its brands include the y/m, LAGUA GEM, STYLEMIXER, nÃ¥gonstans, MOUSSY, BLACK BY MOUSSY, AZUL BY MOUSY, SLY, RIM.ARK, RODEO CROWNS, RODEO CROWNS WIDE BOWL, rienda, Avan Lily, ENFÃLD, HeRIN.CYE, STACCATO, SHEL'TTER, and R4G. The company is also involved in brand and trademark management business. The company was formerly known as Baroque Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baroque Japan Limited in February 2008. Baroque Japan Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3566.T.summary: Uniform Next Co., Ltd. sells uniforms to chain stores, companies, schools, and individuals customers in Japan. The company offers eating and drinks shop uniforms that include cook coats, white coats, aprons, T-shirts, polo shirts, working clothes, and jinbei products, as well as embroidery on uniforms. It also provides work wear work clothes for construction workers, civil engineering works, electricity, machinery, iron works, transportation, and cleaning, as well as factory and other on-site work clothes; and medical wear, such as examination clothes, casey white coat, scrub, nurse wear, etc. Further, the company offers office clothing that include blouses, shirts, cut saws, vests, skirts, culottes, pants, dresses, accessories, and others. Uniform Next Co., Ltd. offers its products through mail order and visiting sale channels. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Fukui, Japan.

3607.T.summary: Kuraudia Holdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the planning, manufacturing, and sale of wedding costumes in Japan and internationally. The company offers wedding dresses, tuxedos, and bridal inners, as well as rents wedding costumes. It also operates a costume salon; and operates and manages a wedding hall. The company was formerly known as KURAUDIA Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuraudia Holdings Co.,Ltd. in September 2017. Kuraudia Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

5B8.F.summary: ABC-Mart,Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retailing of shoes, clothing, and general merchandise products for men, women, and kids in Japan. It develops and manufactures shoes; and licenses various brands. The company is also involved in the sale of owned and purchased products through ABC-MART stores. It offers its products under the VANS, HAWKINS, Saucony, NUOVO, gravis, DANNER, SPERRY, and WHITE'S HOUSE brand names. It operates approximately of 37 stores in Hokkaido, 51 stores in Tohoku, 143 stores in Tokyo, 276 stores in Kanto, 156 stores in Chubu, 164 stores in Kansai, 70 stores in Chugoku and Shikoku, and 130 stores in Kyushu and Okinawa in Japan, as well as 268 stores in South Korea, 51 stores in Taiwan, and 6 stores in the United States. ABC-Mart,Inc. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7416.T.summary: Haruyama Holdings Inc. engages in the sale of menswear, womenswear, and related accessories in Japan. It provides suits and ties, as well as casual, and business clothes. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 464 stores. The company was formerly known as Haruyama Trading Company Limited. and changed its name to Haruyama Holdings Inc. in January 2017. Haruyama Holdings Inc. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Okayama, Japan.

7448.T.summary: Jeans Mate Corporation sells casual clothing and accessories. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7494.T.summary: Konaka Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of specialty stores in Japan. The company's stores primarily offer men's apparel and related clothing products. It operates 388 shops. The company operates its stores under the Suit Select, Konaka the Flag, Futata the Flag, Men's Clothing Konaka, Men's Clothes Futata, and DIFFERENCE names. Konaka Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

7564.T.summary: Workman Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of specialty retail stores by franchise system in Japan. Its stores offer working clothes and work-related products, such as waterproof winter clothing, rain suits, tethers, rainwear, aluminum jumpers and vests, go feathers, yakke products, cargo pants, safety shoes and boots, caps, sanitary boots, kitchen shoes, underground footwear, winter shoes, socks, leather and rubber gloves, white clothes, non-woven fabrics, aprons, safety bands, military hands, masks, helmets, tools, belts, cool clothes, high necks, T-shirts, polo shirts, compression, event uniforms, and office uniforms. The company serves customers from construction, civil engineering, manufacturing, electricity/gas/water supply, transportation/warehouse, food processing, agriculture, forestry and fisheries, eating out, nursing/medical care, and other industries. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 868 stores in 46 prefectures. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7603.T.summary: Mac-House Co., Ltd. operates chain stores focusing primarily on the retail of clothing in Japan. It offers clothing and accessories for men, women, and kids, as well as life style goods. The company offers its products under the Navy, RUSH HOUR, Dickies, GENUINE Dickies, Mossimo, and DISCUS ATHLETIC brands. As of August 31, 2018, it operated 413 stores. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Mac-House Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chiyoda Co., Ltd.

7615.T.summary: Kyoto Kimono Yuzen Co.,Ltd. engages in the sale of kimono, jewelry, and other products in Japan. The company operates 50 stores. It also rents kimono. The company was formerly known as Marukawa Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Kyoto Kimono Yuzen Co.,Ltd. in 1989. Kyoto Kimono Yuzen Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8008.T.summary: Yondoshi Holdings Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, manufacture, wholesale, and retail of jewelry, apparel, bags, and other products in Japan and internationally. The company offers jewelry products primarily under the 4Â°C, 4Â°C BRIDAL, Canal4Â°C, and EAUDOUCE 4Â°C brands. It also plans, designs, and manufactures men's and women's wear; and imports interior products and other products. In addition, the company engages in the small and medium-sized general merchandising business; operation of fashion specialty stores located primarily in the Chugoku and Kyushu areas; development and production of fashion buildings; real estate leasing activities; provision of distribution support services; and export and import of bags. Further, it is involved in managing a network of apparel specialty stores under PALLET brand; and the management of ladies casual wear shops under the LOU name. The company was formerly known as F&A Aqua Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Yondoshi Holdings Inc. in September 2013. Yondoshi Holdings Inc. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8011.T.summary: Sanyo Shokai Ltd. manufactures and sells men's and women's clothes and accessories through department stores, specialty stores, and directly managed stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8013.T.summary: Naigai Co.,Ltd. plans, manufactures, wholesales, imports, and exports textile products. It offers men's, ladies, and children's socks, panty stockings, etc. The company was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8018.T.summary: Sankyo Seiko Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, production, import, and export of apparel products in Japan and internationally. The company provides nightwear and sleeping products, and interior accessories; and ladies, men's, and junior apparel products, as well as supplies textiles and other fabrics. It is also involved in the real estate leasing business, including the rental of offices, stores, and halls. In addition, the company engages in the brand licensing business. It offers its products under the DAKS and Leonard brand names. Sankyo Seiko Co., Ltd. was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8025.T.summary: Tsukamoto Corporation Co., Ltd. engages in the clothing business. The company processes, manufactures, and sells men's apparel and uniforms. It also offers health and beauty products, home lifestyle products, home appliances, household goods, and water treatment products; and information solutions. The company was formerly known as Tsukamoto Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tsukamoto Corporation Co., Ltd. in 2003. Tsukamoto Corporation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1812 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8185.T.summary: Chiyoda Co., Ltd. engages in the retail of shoes, etc. It develops, manufactures, and sells shoes; and clothing products ranging from innerwear to legwear for men, women, and kids. As of June 30, 2020, the company operated 1,031 stores under the SHOE PLAZA, TSRC, CHIYODA HAKI-GOKOCHI, Chiyoda, cloverleaf, SPC, SHOE PLAZA park, SHOES Paletta, VifVif by cloverleaf, COURIPIE, and NATURA store names. Chiyoda Co., Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8214.T.summary: AOKI Holdings Inc. engages in the fashion, anniversary and bridal, and entertainment businesses in Japan. It creates and sells apparel for men and women, as well as business apparel, casual clothing, and accessories under the AOKI and ORIHICA brand names; and operates apparel store in name of Size MAX for big sizes casual clothing for men and women. The company also operates wedding halls and guesthouse-style halls for ceremonies and receptions, as well as offers related products and services. In addition, it operates and manages Cote d'Azur karaoke facilities; KAIKATSU CLUB cafÃ© complexes; and FiT24 amenities and training areas. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

8219.T.summary: Aoyama Trading Co., Ltd. engages in business wear, casual wear, credit card, printing and media, sundry sales, repair service, and other businesses in Japan and internationally. The company offers business wear, such as suits, jackets, slacks, coats, formal wear, and other clothing items; and casual wear, such as jeans. It also issues and manages credit cards, as well as provides small-amount finance; offers a range of sales promotion services, including distributing flyers and direct mails; and publishes magazines. In addition, the company provides repair services for shoes and key duplication under the Mister Minit brand; sells daily merchandise and processed foods; and operates restaurants and fitness gyms. Further, it operates in the web media business. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated 809 Yofuku-no-Aoyama stores; 56 The Suit Company stores; 9 Universal Language stores; 8 White The Suit Company stores; 5 Universal Language Measure's stores; and 30 Aoyama Suits stores. It also operated 12 LEVI'S stores; 15 2nd STREET stores; 2 JUMBLE STORE stores; 100 Yen shop Daiso stores and 6 WTW stores for sundry and interior products; and 35 Yakiniku King restaurants, 11 Yuzu An restaurants, and 1 Anytime Fitness center for gyms. Aoyama Trading Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9271.T.summary: Wagokoro Co., Ltd. engages in retail, services, and OEM businesses in Japan. The company operates Japanese accessories stores; and sells its products through mail order sites. It also rents Kimono; and manufacture and sells silver accessories, stone bracelets, sunglasses/glasses, buckles, hats, jewelry, umbrella, leather products, and chopsticks. The company operates 67 stores. Wagokoro Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9837.T.summary: Morito Co., Ltd. plans, develops, and produces eyelets, hooks, flat fasteners, and other apparels worldwide. It also provides footwear accessories and articles, as well as materials for camera components and vehicle interiors. In addition, the company offers various categories of footwear materials; and value added materials for various types of apparel, including casualwear, sportswear, formalwear, and uniforms. Further, it is involved in the retail distribution of insoles and shoe/foot care articles; and provision of transportation equipment materials, such as nets, emblems, fasteners, straps, rubber textiles, and magic tape products for automobile, train, and aircraft parts, as well as ODM materials comprising sewn, molded, or other processed articles in the form of semi-finished and finished products for various industries. The company was formerly known as Morito & Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Morito Co., Ltd. in 1976. Morito Co., Ltd. was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

9878.T.summary: SEKIDO Co., Ltd. operates fashion stores. The company's stores offer bags, wallets, watches, and jewelry products. It operates 16 directly-managed stores. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9966.T.summary: Fujikyu Corporation engages in the sale of handicrafts, clothing items, and other related goods and items. It sells its products through a network of handicraft specialty shops, daily merchandise specialty stores, and mail order and Internet. The company operates 474 stores. Fujikyu Corporation was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

9B7.F.summary: Aoyama Trading Co., Ltd. engages in business wear, casual wear, credit card, printing and media, sundry sales, repair service, and other businesses in Japan and internationally. The company offers business wear, such as suits, jackets, slacks, coats, formal wear, and other clothing items; and casual wear, such as jeans. It also issues and manages credit cards, as well as provides small-amount finance; offers a range of sales promotion services, including distributing flyers and direct mails; and publishes magazines. In addition, the company provides repair services for shoes and key duplication under the Mister Minit brand; sells daily merchandise and processed foods; and operates restaurants and fitness gyms. Further, it operates in the web media business. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated 809 Yofuku-no-Aoyama stores; 56 The Suit Company stores; 9 Universal Language stores; 8 White The Suit Company stores; 5 Universal Language Measure's stores; and 30 Aoyama Suits stores. It also operated 12 LEVI'S stores; 15 2nd STREET stores; 2 JUMBLE STORE stores; 100 Yen shop Daiso stores and 6 WTW stores for sundry and interior products; and 35 Yakiniku King restaurants, 11 Yuzu An restaurants, and 1 Anytime Fitness center for gyms. Aoyama Trading Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

FRCOF.summary: Fast Retailing Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates as an apparel designer and retailer in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: UNIQLO Japan, UNIQLO International, GU, and Global Brands. It manufactures and retails clothing for men, women, children, and babies; and lingerie, as well as other goods and items. The company operates stores and franchises under the UNIQLO, GU, PLST, Theory, COMPTOIR DES COTONNIERS, J Brand, and PRINCESSE TAM.TAM brand names. It also sells its products through online; and provides real estate leasing services. The company was formerly known as Ogori Shoji Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. in September 1991. Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Yamaguchi, Japan.

FRCOY.summary: Fast Retailing Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates as an apparel designer and retailer in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: UNIQLO Japan, UNIQLO International, GU, and Global Brands. It manufactures and retails clothing for men, women, children, and babies; and lingerie, as well as other goods and items. The company operates stores and franchises under the UNIQLO, GU, PLST, Theory, COMPTOIR DES COTONNIERS, J Brand, and PRINCESSE TAM.TAM brand names. It also sells its products through online; and provides real estate leasing services. The company was formerly known as Ogori Shoji Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. in September 1991. Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Yamaguchi, Japan.

RGH.F.summary: RIGHT ON Co., Ltd. operates a chain of casual wear specialty stores in Japan. Its stores primarily offer jeans, as well as other casual wear products to male and female customers. The company also sells its products through online. As of August 20, 2018, it operated approximately 498 stores. RIGHT ON Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Tsukuba, Japan.
